title: Logo help...

comments.content:
What is this logo for?   
   
My initial reaction is that there is not enough contrast between "adora" and "media" -- perhaps smaller all caps or a different font all together for "media" would work better.   
   
The possiblities for colors would change with adjustments to your current typesetting.

can you drop 'media' altogether? 'adora' is quite nice. 'media' just seems to be distracting us from the 'adora'.   
   
Maybe keep the spacing for media, but use small-caps and make them about half the size they are now.
I agree with darrel. those are nice letterforms by themselves. if you must keep media, use something smallcaps/sans
